title: Palmerstown, U.S.A.
text:
Palmerstown, U.S.A. (shortened to Palmerstown in March 1981) is a <a href="Drama%20%28film%20and%20television%29">television drama series</a> that aired on <a href="CBS">CBS</a> from March 20, 1980 to June 9, 1981. It was created by <a href="Norman%20Lear">Norman Lear</a> and <a href="Alex%20Haley">Alex Haley</a>, whose childhood was the basis for the series. It tells the story of two nine-year-old boys in the rural Southern community of Palmerstown who become best friends during the <a href="Great%20Depression">Great Depression</a>, despite one being black and the other being white.
See also.
